offerDetails.name: iPhone 11 64GB (2020) - Black
offerDetails.description: Shoot 4K video, beautiful portraits and sweeping landscapes with the all-new dual-camera system. Capture your best low-light photos with Night mode. See true-to-life colour in your photos, videos and games on the 6.1-inch Liquid Retina display. Experience unprecedented performance with A13 Bionic for gaming, augmented reality and photography. Do more and charge less with all-day battery life. And worry less with water resistance up to 2 metres for 30 minutes.

offerDetails.name: CAT S62 Pro - Black
offerDetails.description: The CAT® S62 PRO is the ultimate work phone with the best integrated thermal camera available in smartphones. With its game-changing technology, the CAT® S62 PRO will help locate and diagnose the damp, the draught, the leak, the hotspot, the electrical short, the blockage or the elevated temperature. Always on, always ready, the CAT® S62 PRO is the pinnacle of innovation, functional design and rugged durability.

offerDetails.name: Samsung Galaxy XCover 5 - Black
offerDetails.description: The rugged Samsung XCover 5 embodies toughness and versatility. Durable and comfortable while meeting US military standards, the XCover 5 combines IP68 watertightness and dust resistance with the convenience of a replaceable battery. Increased touch sensitivity lets you use the immersive 5.3” HD+ display while wearing gloves or with damp hands. No other phone is built to be used like the XCover 5.

offerDetails.name: OPPO A54 5G - Fluid Black
offerDetails.description: Anticipate the future and experience the power of the OPPO A54 5G. View life on the 6.5” FHD+ 90Hz Hyper-colour screen, and capture life for yourself with the 48MP AI Quad camera. Equipped with 4GB RAM and 64GB of internal storage, the A54 powers on thanks to its 5000mAh large battery, while the dual SIM lets you take two phone numbers with you in this 5G Ready device.

offerDetails.name: CAT B40 - Black
offerDetails.description: The Cat B40 is an ultra-rugged reliable and durable 4G mobile device. Easy-to-use, glove-friendly buttons on an alphanumeric keypad make calling and texting simple - no touchscreen hassles. Accidentally drop it and it’s going to bounce (tested to 1.8m on steel). Drop it in water - or wash it if you need to - and it will keep on going. The Cat B40 provides fundamental dependability, helping workers get the job done in the most extreme conditions.

Hasselblad Camera for Mobile lets you take iconic shots with ease, then show them off in the 6.5” FHD+ 120Hz 1 Billion Colour Bionic Display. The Find X5 is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor and offers  8GB of RAM and 256GB storage, while a 4800mAh battery equipped with SUPERVOOC fast charge provides all the power that's needed.

For viewing and image-capture excellence, the A73 5G delivers a powerful 6.7-inch 120Hz Super AMOLED+ Display and a 108MP Camera, so you can capture every detail - and with bigger pixels you can take bright pictures even at night. offerDetails.name: OPPO Reno8 Lite 5G - Cosmic Black
offerDetails.description: Capture your moments like never before and show off your style with the Reno8 Lite 5G. Switch between the 64MP main camera and depth camera for creative Bokeh Shots, and Macro Camera for microworld detail. The Reno8 Lite houses lightning fast 5G speeds (where available) supported by 8GB of RAM, all within an ultra slim design and lightweight body. Enjoy the power of a long-lasting battery you can charge quickly, and store more of the memories you love with 128GB of storage.

offerDetails.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch4 Classic LTE 46mm Black - Promo
offerDetails.description: Enhance your Galaxy smartphone experience with the Galaxy Watch4 Classic 42mm, the most compact size in the Classic design. This stainless steel watch offers quick and simple navigation, MIL-STD-810G military grade durability and IP68 protection from dust, dirt, sand and submersion in up to 50m of water. Wear OS lets you access Google Pay, Maps, Play and Assistant from your wrist.
